detailsData.title: High Quality
detailsData.content: BoyesLegal, APC provides comprehensive legal services across California, focusing on real estate, estate planning, probate, and personal injury claims. They are known for their informed advocacy and trustworthy advice.

detailsData.title: Client Focused
detailsData.content: The firm prides itself on understanding clients' circumstances and tailoring services to unique needs, ensuring strategic representation for achieving goals.

detailsData.title: Experienced Team
detailsData.content: With a team of skilled attorneys, BoyesLegal offers expertise in a range of legal areas, ensuring clients receive first-rate representation and dependable service.

detailsData.title: Comprehensive Services
detailsData.content: From real estate transactions to personal injury claims, BoyesLegal provides a full suite of legal services, helping clients navigate complex legal challenges.

address: 84 W. Santa Clara Street, Suite 490 San Jose, CA 95113
valueProp: BoyesLegal, APC provides comprehensive legal services to clients throughout California on matters such as real estate, estate planning, probate, business law, and personal injury claims. We have a well-deserved reputation as informed advocates who offer each client trustworthy advice when they need it most.

testimonalData.text: Patricia Boyes was an excellent lawyer for me in a case that dragged on for two years.
testimonalData.author: Anonymous

testimonalData.text: I recently hired Patricia to help me with a relatively small matter around a service appointment that went sideways.
testimonalData.author: Client

testimonalData.text: We (my wife and I) had severe personal injuries. Patricia and team are amazing.
testimonalData.author: Client
